name: Escape from Gnop '72
description:
Right... Boop... Left... Boop... Your life, for as long as you can remember it. Eternity between two rectangles...

But suddenly there's something new. A feeling of... control? Direction? Your rectangular wardens seem a little nervous at the sight of these large numbers appearing overhead. This might be your chance to escape your fate, to escape from Gnop!

Controls & Gameplay:
- Outwit the paddles through clever use of your brakes (Button 1), boost (Button 2), and sudden turns (dial) to increase the score. Reach 7 points to escape!
Intended for play with the IMS Jam-Jam-Revolution controller (more info here if you want to construct your own: https://itch.io/jam/imsjjr)
Keyboard controls if you don't have a IMS Jam-Jam-Revolution controller:
- Brakes - Z
- Boost - X
- Spin Left/Right - Left/Right Arrow
Note: If the game isn't recognizing your controller or keyboard even after clicking into it, try going into fullscreen using the button at the bottom right of the game.

Made by Micha Faw in about 3 hours for the Indie Maker Syndicate's Jam Jam Revolution alt-ctrl jam.
